name: ACHIEVEMENT_1
description: Build and improve the empire with the help of your people. Reach 1000 number of Citizens resource.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_2
description: Use the knowledge and curiosity of your best scholars. Complete research of 1 technology.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_3
description: Bring knowledge and wisdom to your nation. Complete the research of all technologies in the Invention tree.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_4
description: The greatest city of your empire will become the centre of the world! Build a city of size 8.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_5
description: Happy people give no trouble. Reach 150% Happiness resource.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_6
description: Your men will die for you! Reach the Excellent level of army morale with any player.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_7
description: Keep your granaries full! Reach threshold of 30 food per turn.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_8
description: Steady income in the state coffers allows you to plan ahead. Reach surplus of 30 gold per turn.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_9
description: Your name has already reached all corners of the Mediterranean. Reach surplus of 20 influence points per turn.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_10
description: Work for prosperity. Establish 3 trade routes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_11
description: Build a worthy place where theory and science can meet. Build an Academy in 1 of your cities.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_12
description: Open the gates of your cities to merchants from far and wide. Build Trading improvement in 10 of your cities.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_13
description: Protect your cities! Build any type of fortification improvements (stockade, palisade, city walls) in 10 of your cities.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_14
description: Men with special training are always needed! Give 3 of your military units at least 3 improvements each.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_15
description: Show your political genius. Merge with 1 nation in a confederation.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_16
description: Plan your political strategy. Merge with 1 nation in a federation.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_17
description: Weak will be swallowed by the mighty! Sign an absorption agreement with 1 nation.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_18
description: Your men have to trust you! Try to boost the army morale with any opponent by using one of the army morale tools (prophecy, strategic review, speach, propaganda).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_19
description: If you cannot break in, let them starve! Lay a successful siege to 1 city until it surrenders.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_20
description: Spare your men and reach your goals another way! Lay a successful siege to 3 cities until they surrender.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_21
description: Use other sources than military to reach your goals! Take over 1 foreign city by successfully applying influence on it.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_22
description: Grass is always greener on the other side of the fence. Take 5 foreign cities by successfully applying influence on them.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_23
description: Expand your sphere of influence. Take control over 10 foreign cities by applying influence on them.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_24
description: Rule or be ruled! Conquer another nation.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_25
description: Let no-one doubt your desire to rule the world! Conquer 3 nations.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_26
description: Push relentlessly through the defense lines. Seize a capital city of another nation.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_27
description: Take one city and others will soon follow! Take 1 foreign city in a battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_28
description: The true power lies in the cities. Conquer 5 foreign cities.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_29
description: Every city won on the enemy makes him weaker and you stronger! Conquer 10 foreign cities.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_30
description: Fortuna favors the brave. Attack and destroy 1 enemy infantry or cavalry unit in a battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_31
description: Trust your men on the battlefield. Attack and destroy 5 enemy infantry or cavalry units in military engagements.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_32
description: Never fear the enemy! Attack and destroy 10 enemy infantry or cavalry units in military engagements.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_33
description: Ram and sink enemy ships! Attack and destroy 1 enemy vessel in a naval battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_34
description: Let the Gods guide your ships. Attack and destroy 5 enemy vessels in naval engagements.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_35
description: The depths of the sea are waiting for your enemies! Destroy 10 enemy vessels in naval engagements.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_36
description: Small or big - the country needs towns and cities! Build 1 city.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_37
description: Towns and cities are natural centers of culture, learning and commerce. Build 5 cities.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_38
description: Your rule relies on cities! Build 10 cities.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_39
description: Mighty heroes boast many scars! Reach 100% experience points with at least 1 unit.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_40
description: Write your name into historical annals! Win 1 game by completing any victory condition.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_41
description: Join the club of masters! Win 3 games by completing any victory condition.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_42
description: Use the riches of the lands by cultivating them. Build 3 fields or farms.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_43
description: Improve the infrastructure of your empire. Build 1 Settler.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_44
description: Fields, roads, bridges - the tasks are endless. Build 10 Settler units.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_45
description: War is their daily bread. Build 1 advanced ground military unit.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_46
description: Stronger, faster, unbeatable. Build 1 expert ground military unit.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_47
description: Keep up with the advancements of military techniques. Build 5 advanced ground military units.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_48
description: Create the strongest army in the world! Build 5 expert ground military units.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_49
description: All capable men should be ready to take up arms! Build 10 military units of any type.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_50
description: Call your men to their duty! Build 20 military units of any type.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_51
description: Keep the resource production high! Get 5 mines (gold, coal, iron, stones) to reach size 3 (by connecting them to a blacksmith(s) and city(ies) with paved roads.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_52
description: Give it a chance! Clock 1 hour of gameplay.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_53
description: Nothing comes easy in life. Clock 10 hours of gameplay and show a real dedication.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_54
description: Wisdom comes with age and experience! Complete 100 hours of gameplay.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_55
description: Just one more turn! Play the game at least an hour every day for one week.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_56
description: Purpose justifies the means! Successfully employ piracy against another player(s) at least once.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_57
description: Win by completing all 5 victory conditions in the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_58
description: Open your mind to the lessons of the wise! Complete simple tutorial for any one of these nations – Roman Empire, Carthage, Ptolemaic Empire

name: ACHIEVEMENT_59
description: Win a game by completing any victory condition playing as one of the empires of the campaign map – Roman Empire, Carthage, Seleucid Empire, Ptolemaic Empire

name: ACHIEVEMENT_60
description: Win a game by completing any victory condition playing as one of the small kingdoms in the campaign map– Kingdom of Ardiaei, Epirus, Athens, Sparta, Antigonid kingdom, Macedon, Bospran, Pontus, Pergamon

name: ACHIEVEMENT_61
description: Win a game by completing any of the victory conditons playing as one of the Barbarian nations in the campaign map – Iberia tribes, Gallaeci tribes, Massilia, Celtic tribes, German tribes, Odrysian kingdom, Dacian tribes)

name: ACHIEVEMENT_62
description: Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing as any nation of the campaign map on Noob difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_63
description: Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing as any nation of the campaign map on Beginner difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_64
description: Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing as any nation of the campaign map on Easy difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_65
description: Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing as any nation of the campaign map on Medium difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_66
description: Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing for any nation of the campaign map on Hard difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_67
description: Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing as any nation of the campaign map on Legendary difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_68
description: Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing as any nation of the campaign map on Heroic difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_69
description: Keep the abacus at hand - win a game by completing the Winning points victory condition playing as any nation of the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_70
description: Take up the challenge - win a game by completing the Overall victory condition playing as any nation of the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_71
description: Rule and police the world - win a game by completing the Military superiority victory condition playing as any nation of the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_72
description: Think, discover, prove - win a game by completing the Technological dominance victory condition playing as any nation of the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_73
description: Cultivate the strengths of your people - win a game by completing the Country development victory condition playing as any nation of the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_74
description: Stronger starting position means stronger opponents! Survive 150 turns playing as one of the empires in the campaign map – Roman Empire, Carthage, Seleucid Empire, Ptolemaic Empire

name: ACHIEVEMENT_75
description: Win your place in the sun or die in the shadows. Survive 100 turns playing as one of the small kingdoms in the campaign map– Kingdom of Ardiaei, Epirus, Athens, Sparta, Antigonid kingdom, Macedon, Bospran, Pontus, Pergamon

name: ACHIEVEMENT_76
description: Pit your strength against the strongest. Survive 50 turns playing as one of the Barbarian nations in the campaign map – Iberia tribes, Gallaeci tribes, Massilia, Celtic tribes, German tribes, Odrysian kingdom, Dacian tribes

name: ACHIEVEMENT_77
description: Train minds can come up with unusual ideas! Build a Philosophy school improvement in 5 cities.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_78
description: Take the leap of faith. Use any of the State decisions at least once.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_79
description: Become a master of a federation or confederation of 3 players in the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_80
description: Realistic goals can lead to grand victory. Complete all objectives in 1 game playing as any nation in the campaign map

name: ACHIEVEMENT_81
description: Win a game in the campaign map by completing any of the victory conditions in 200 turns.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_82
description: Win a game in the campaign map by completing any of the victory conditions in 150 turns.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_83
description: Win a game in the campaign map by completing any of the victory conditions in 100 turns.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_84
description: As Roman Empire complete the objective City of Carthago - be the first one to conquer the mighty city (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_85
description: As Epirus complete the objective Antigonid - defeat the Antigonid kingdom and claim the throne of Macedon for yourself (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_86
description: As Carthage complete the objective City of Roma - seize the Roman metropolis (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_87
description: As Sparta complete the objective Roman allies - forge a military alliance with Roman Empire (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_88
description: As Athens complete the objective City walls - re-build the old fortifications in the city of Athens (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_89
description: As Gallaeci Tribes complete the objective Iberia - conquer the Iberian peninsula before other nations (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_90
description: As Antigonid complete the objective Byzantium - take the city and unite the Macedonian empire again.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_91
description: As Ardiaei complete the objective Alliance - forge a close military alliance with Epirus.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_92
description: As Macedon complete the objective Odrysian campaing - lead your armies north and take the barbarian city of Seuthopolis in 20 turns.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_93
description: As Seleucid Empire complete the objective Syria - claim the territories of Syria and Judae for your empire (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_94
description: As Ptolemaic Empire complete the objective Syria - get the territory of Syria under your control (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_95
description: As Pontus complete the objective Pergamon - conquer the neighboring Pergamon.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_96
description: As Massilia complete the objective Celtic conquest - lead a campaign against the Celts until they surrender or die (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_97
description: As Bospran complete the objective Trading outpost - establish a stronghold in Asia Minor (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_98
description: As Pergamon complete the objective Democracy - lead your nation towards Democracy government.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_99
description: As German Tribes complete the objective Expansion south - lead your men south and take the coastal city Rhizon (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_100
description: As Iberain Tribes complete the objective Norhtern Iberia - explore and conquer regions in the north (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_101
description: As Odrysian kingdom complete the objective Region of Thrace - claim the territory of Thrace for your people (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_102
description: As Celtic Tribes complete the objective City of Massilia - lead a campaign to the south and take the prospering city of Massilia (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_103
description: As Dacian Tribes complete the objective Germanic threat - stand up to the tribes in the west, there could be only one winner (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
